meanings.sent1: The movie had an antisentimental tone, focusing on facts rather than emotions.
meanings.sent2: Her antisentimental nature made her a practical decision-maker.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his antisentimental cat only cared about food, not cuddles.
meanings.sent4: The artist's antisentimental brush strokes conveyed raw honesty.
meanings.sent5: The antisentimental approach of the scientist led to groundbreaking discoveries.

meanings.definition: Not characterized by or showing sentimentality.
meanings.sent1: The antisentimental novel presented a stark view of reality.
meanings.sent2: His antisentimental response to the sad news surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The antisentimental robot had no time for sentimental gestures.
meanings.sent4: The antisentimental landscape painting captured the harsh beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: Her antisentimental attitude towards love kept her focused on her goals.
